relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: OpenDocument Presentation Document Format (ODP), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">presentation</field><field name="filenameExtension">odp, otp</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: An XML-based format for editable presentation documents, usually with file extension .odp.   Part of the OpenDocument Format (ODF) format family.  Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.  Component files are packaged using a constrained version of the ZIP format.
